definition: without the slightest hesitation
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
(negative prefix)/not/no
as if/(just) like/just as/still/yet
abbr. for Henan province 河南 in central China
happy/carefree/at one's ease/variant of 預|预[yu4]/old variant of 與|与[yu4]

sentences.english: His father did not hesitate to support and help him.
sentences.chinese: 李父毫不猶豫支持並扶持。

sentences.english: It was my neighbor’s wife! I rushed in without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 原來是我鄰居的妻子在叫喚，我毫不猶豫的衝了過去。

sentences.english: Fang's wife drank the poison with no hesitation. The poisoned turned out to be a cup of vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 房的老婆毫不猶豫地把毒酒喝了，其實那這是一杯醋。

sentences.english: The Shepherdess said with no hesitation.
'Treacle, ' said the Dormouse, without considering at all this time.
sentences.chinese: “糖漿，”睡鼠這次毫不猶豫地回答。

sentences.english: I shot without hesitation and the ball swished in.
sentences.chinese: 我毫不猶豫地投籃，球嗖地一聲進了。

sentences.english: Entered Ningbo University, one of 211 Universities of China, I chose Biotechnology without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 高考填志願選專業時，我毫不猶豫選了“生物”。

sentences.english: His rise through the ranks was helped by the fact that he never hesitated to decapitate a superior.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不猶豫殺死上級的行爲幫助了他的晉升。

sentences.english: I then registered without any hesitation.
It is not possible to know forthwith whose head or hand is meant.
sentences.chinese: 毫不猶豫地認識誰的頭或手是什麼意義那是不可能的。

sentences.english: Helen's opinions were always principles to be unwaveringly acted on.
sentences.chinese: 海倫的意見永遠是應毫不猶豫遵守的原則。

sentences.english: In college, I did not hesitate to select a premedical curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 在大學，我毫不猶豫地選擇了醫學預科課程。
“三十四，”約翰尼毫不猶豫地回答。

sentences.english: Therefore, Baoyong recommended the full-beauty naked diamond worth million dollars without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 所以寶詠毫不猶豫向他推薦了價值百萬的全美裸鑽。

sentences.english: He had no hesitation in imputing the failure of his marriage to his wife's shortcomings.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不猶豫地將他婚姻的失敗歸罪於他妻子的缺點。

sentences.english: I can recommend Ms Kamachi without the slightest hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 我毫不猶豫地向您推薦廉千女士。

definition: at once/immediately/promptly/swiftly
not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back/no surrender/to pursue justice with no second thoughts
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
brazen/audacious/outrageous/bold/daring/fearless
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
unaware/unconscious of sth
reckless/regardless of everything
right away/quickly/immediately
in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side/to have the courage of one's convictions/just and forceful
excited/excitement/(physiology) excitation
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
amazed/astonished/to surprise/amazing/astonishment/awe
